abstract: Taiwan Mobile said it will not extend a deadline with the private equity firm Carlyle on their stalled $1 billion deal for Carlyle’s Taiwan cable TV unit stake, citing regulatory problems.
snippet: Taiwan Mobile said it will not extend a deadline with the private equity firm Carlyle on their stalled $1 billion deal for Carlyle’s Taiwan cable TV unit stake, citing regulatory problems.
lead_paragraph: Taiwan Mobile said it will not extend a deadline with the private equity firm Carlyle on their stalled $1 billion deal for Carlyle’s Taiwan cable TV unit stake, citing regulatory problems, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Carlyle Sees Taiwan TV Deal Fading
